description: This file defines a logging utility class 'Log' for managing and printing logs related to information, warnings, errors, documentation issues, and general messages within a software project. It offers methods for logging messages with different severity levels, formatting output, and conditionally displaying logs based on severity settings.

classes.name: Log
classes.description: A class encapsulating logging functionalities including info, warning, error, documentation issues, and general messages with console output and internal message storage, configurable by verbosity and severity levels.

methods.name: __init__(self, name, verbose = False, warnings = True, doc_issues = False)
methods.description: Initializes the Log object with name and display options for info, warnings, and documentation issues, setting console color codes based on OS.

methods.name: __Print(self, text, file="")
methods.description: Internally used method for printing messages to stdout with optional file context.

methods.name: Info(self, text, file="")
methods.description: Logs an informational message, optionally associated with a file.

methods.name: InfoLine(self, obj, text, file="")
methods.description: Logs an informational message with file name and line number extracted from an object, handling exceptions for missing attributes.

methods.name: Warn(self, text, file="")
methods.description: Logs a warning message, optionally associated with a file.

methods.name: WarnLine(self, obj, text, file="")
methods.description: Logs a warning message with file name and line number extracted from an object, handling exceptions.

methods.name: Error(self, text, file="")
methods.description: Logs an error message, optionally associated with a file.

methods.name: Print(self, text, file="")
methods.description: Outputs a general message to standard output, optionally with a file context.

methods.name: Dump(self)
methods.description: Outputs all accumulated errors, warnings, and info messages.

methods.name: Header(self, text)
methods.description: Marks the beginning of processing a file, sets the current file name for log output.

methods.name: Ellipsis(self,text, front=True)
methods.description: Truncates a string to 32 characters adding ellipsis either at the front or back.

ctags.name: __init__
ctags.pattern: /^    def __init__(self, name, verbose = False, warnings = True, doc_issues = False):$/
ctags.signature: (self, name, verbose = False, warnings = True, doc_issues = False)
